ComicInfo.Title: My Fathers' House
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wildcats go west as Spartan takes command! But can an indestructible alien android be trusted to change the world? Attend a funeral, see the new Halo Building, and check in with Voodoo and Maul in Miami...in an issue that sows the seeds for a tumultuous year ahead for the 'Cats!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:22:22. [CVDB76617]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/wildcats-12-my-fathers-house/4000-76617/

ComicInfo.Characters: Grifter, Jackson King, Maul, Miss Kincaid, Noir, Spartan, Void, Voodoo
